title: Family offers £1,000 reward after cars damaged
content:
A REWARD of £1,000 is being offered for information leading to a conviction, after four cars were severely damaged while parked outside a family home. 
 
Julie Taylor, from Liddeston, Milford Haven, said she was 'devastated' to discover all four of her family's vehicles - including her son's new car, had been scratched, and the tyres of each let down. 
 
Police were alerted to the incident in the early hours of Wednesday, September 16. 
   
 Share article  
   
A green Mitsubishi Shogun, a green Vauxhall Astra, a silver Vauxhall Astra and a black Chrysler Kalos were significantly damaged. 
 
Police are investigating, and are appealing to anyone who witnessed the incident or anything suspicious, or anyone with any information to contact them by calling 101, or Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555111.
